We all love cheesy dishes, Here's a Curd and Cheese Sandwich Recipe for you..



Now, this is perfect as it is doesn't need any dip as well as makes a Perrrfeecctt dish to have in the breakfast, or in the Lunch box, or as anytime snack! "Ek teer - teen nishane" :P Let's get to this amazing Suji Toast Style Cheese Sandwich recipe!

author: Yaman Agarwal
recipeNotes: Instead of using 3 tbsp corn meal you can use semolina.
title: Curd n Cheese Sandwich - Indian Grilled Sandwich | Kids Lunch Box Recipes

steps.text: In a bowl, mix in onions, grated cheese, 2 tbsp curd and green chutney. Add salt to taste, 1/2 Tsp oregano and 1/2 Tsp chili flakes. Mix,filling is ready keep aside.
In another bowl, mix in semolina, corn meal, salt to taste, 1/2 tsp chili flakes and 1/4 cup curd. Add water to make a thin batter.
Heat up a griddle pan, with 2 tbsp Hudson Canola Oil.
Take a bread slice, load up the the filling place a cheese slice on, cover with another bread. Press, dip in the semolina-cornmeal batter and Keep to grill in the Hot Grill Pan.
Once golden from beneath, spread 1 tsp Hudson Canola oil on the uncooked slice and flip over to grill! Slice and serve, or pack in the lunch box! :)
